```{.r .cell-code}

```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Warning in graph_from_data_frame(gotDislike, directed = FALSE): In `d' `NA'
elements were replaced with string "NA"
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
plot.igraph(gotDislike.ig)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Week1Challenge_KenDocekal_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-7-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::




Tests below show the data is unimodal, undirected, and unweighted 


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
is_directed(gotDislike.ig)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] FALSE
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
is_weighted(gotDislike.ig)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] FALSE
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
is_bipartite(gotDislike.ig)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] FALSE
```
:::
